title: Will the MRD cutoff change for each sem, as its based on CGPA
content: The MRD cutoff for the first sem in PESU RR campus was 9.50 for both the cycles, will it remain the same next sem, where the second sem SGPA will no longer be equal to their CGPA

comments.body: It's usually around 9.5 , it went till 9.25 for us in 2nd sem
they fucked up our sgpas in 2nd sem by not applying relative grading at all
EC campus had even lower cutoffs. they tanked our SGPA by not applying relative grading at all.
